metadata.name: Browser Execution In Headless Mode
metadata.comment: Detects execution of Chromium based browser in headless mode

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM process_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (lower(activity_id) = lower('1') AND (endswith(lower(process.name), lower('\\brave.exe')) OR endswith(lower(process.name), lower('\\chrome.exe')) OR endswith(lower(process.name), lower('\\msedge.exe')) OR endswith(lower(process.name), lower('\\opera.exe')) OR endswith(lower(process.name), lower('\\vivaldi.exe'))) AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('--headless')))

output.summary: Detects execution of Chromium based browser in headless mode
